QuestData.Title: Sigil Reclamation
QuestData.Description:
The smooth square sigil weighs a fair amount more than its appearance would suggest.
Handling it results in an intense tingling sensation in your palm- this is an object of focused, pure power.
Such an advantage should not be so easily surrendered to the Nightborne.
QuestData.RewardText: You were wise to keep these out of our enemies' hands, $c. I believe you can be trusted.
